Digital_Output.name: Digital Output
Digital_Output.description: Generic digital output for non-specific actuators

Digital_Output_State.name: Digital Output State
Digital_Output_State.description: The current state of a digital output.

Digital_Output_Polarity.name: Digital Output Polarity
Digital_Output_Polarity.description: The polarity of a digital ouput as a Boolean (0 = Normal, 1= Reversed).

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the output as a string, for instance, "LED"
